attributes.action: Save the NHS from privatisation - FULL STOP!
attributes.additional_details: The NHS is something which this country should feel very proud about. It is available to all regardless of their social standing and should continue to be so. This petition is to get the government to put a halt to their plans of privatisation in whatever form that may take. To stop their plans on outsourcing services to the private sector and keep it publically funded. It is the one public service that should be protected.

rejection.details: Please see: Suspend the privatisation of the NHS
